tossup_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three compounds that would form a solid state composed of molecules interacting through hydrogen bonds: 1) Water; 2) Acetone; 3) Silicon dioxide.
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three statements concerning beryllium that are true: 1) Beryllium has a higher melting point than both magnesium and calcium; 2) Beryllium chloride has a higher ionic character than magnesium chloride; 3) Beryllium has a filled 2s subshell.
